events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position.
The candidate's background in development and devops matches the engineering cluster requirements and has been categorized accordingly.
A senior recruiter experienced with engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's application moving forward.
The initial screening call was completed where we discussed the candidate's experience with software development and devops tools.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm for the opportunity to join as a software engineer.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to further assess the candidate's software development skills.
